TestCase.name: testInnerJoinWithNonEquiJoinPredicate
TestCase.Resource: SELECT c, g FROM Table5 INNER JOIN Table3 ON a = d AND d < 2 AND b < h

LogicalProject(c=[$7], g=[$3]) +- LogicalProject(d=[$0], e=[$1], f=[$2], g=[$3], h=[$4], a=[$6], b=[$7], c=[$8]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($6, $0), $5, <($7, $4))], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(d=[$0], e=[$1], f=[$2], g=[$3], h=[$4], $f5=[<($0, 2)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, Table5]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, Table3]])

Calc(select=[c, g]) +- HashJoin(where=[AND(=(a, d), <(b, h))], join=[a, b, c, d, g, h], joinType=[InnerJoin], isBroadcast=[true], build=[right]) :- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[broadcast]) +- Calc(select=[d, g, h], where=[<(d, 2)]) +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_1]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h])

TestCase.name: testFullOuterJoin
TestCase.Resource: SELECT c, g FROM Table3 FULL OUTER JOIN Table5 ON b = e
LogicalProject(c=[$2], g=[$6]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($1, $4)], joinType=[full]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, Table3]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, Table5]])

Calc(select=[c, g]) +- HashJoin(where=[=(b, e)], join=[e, g, b, c], joinType=[FullOuterJoin], build=[left]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[e]]) : +- Calc(select=[e, g]) : +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_1]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) +- Calc(select=[b, c]) +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testInnerJoin
TestCase.Resource: SELECT c, g FROM Table3, Table5 WHERE a = d

LogicalProject(c=[$2], g=[$6]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($0, $3)]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, Table3]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, Table5]])

Calc(select=[c, g]) +- HashJoin(where=[=(a, d)], join=[d, g, a, c], joinType=[InnerJoin], isBroadcast=[true], build=[right]) :- Calc(select=[d, g]) : +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_1]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h]) +- Exchange(distribution=[broadcast]) +- Calc(select=[a, c]) +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testInnerJoinWithFilter
TestCase.Resource: SELECT c, g FROM Table3, Table5 WHERE a = d AND d < 2

LogicalProject(c=[$2], g=[$6]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=($0, $3), <($3, 2))]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, Table3]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, Table5]])

Calc(select=[c, g]) +- HashJoin(where=[=(a, d)], join=[a, c, d, g], joinType=[InnerJoin], isBroadcast=[true], build=[right]) :- Calc(select=[a, c]) : +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[broadcast]) +- Calc(select=[d, g], where=[<(d, 2)]) +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_1]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h])

TestCase.name: testJoinWithMultipleKeys
TestCase.Resource: SELECT c, g FROM Table5 INNER JOIN Table3 ON a = d AND b = e

LogicalProject(c=[$7], g=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($5, $0), =($6, $1))], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, Table5]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, Table3]])

Calc(select=[c, g]) +- HashJoin(where=[AND(=(a, d), =(b, e))], join=[d, e, g, a, b, c], joinType=[InnerJoin], isBroadcast=[true], build=[right]) :- Calc(select=[d, e, g]) : +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_1]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h]) +- Exchange(distribution=[broadcast]) +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testLeftOuterJoin
TestCase.Resource: SELECT c, g FROM Table3 LEFT OUTER JOIN Table5 ON b = e
LogicalProject(c=[$2], g=[$6]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($1, $4)], joinType=[left]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, Table3]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, Table5]])

Calc(select=[c, g]) +- HashJoin(where=[=(b, e)], join=[e, g, b, c], joinType=[RightOuterJoin], isBroadcast=[true], build=[left]) :- Exchange(distribution=[broadcast]) : +- Calc(select=[e, g]) : +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_1]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h]) +- Calc(select=[b, c]) +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testRightOuterJoin
TestCase.Resource: SELECT c, g FROM Table3 RIGHT OUTER JOIN Table5 ON b = e
LogicalProject(c=[$2], g=[$6]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($1, $4)], joinType=[right]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, Table3]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, Table5]])

Calc(select=[c, g]) +- HashJoin(where=[=(b, e)], join=[e, g, b, c], joinType=[LeftOuterJoin], isBroadcast=[true], build=[right]) :- Calc(select=[e, g]) : +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_1]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h]) +- Exchange(distribution=[broadcast]) +- Calc(select=[b, c]) +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a, b, c])
